songs.title: Pride and Joy
songs.lyrics:
You've got me hide all my emotions
I'm swimming in a salt of lover's ocean
You've got me so I just can't quit

You give, you give, you give me
You give, you give, you give me
Everything I need
Keep on, keep on, just give me
Keep on, keep on, just give me
Everything a love gonna need

(I wanna) I wanna be your pride and joy
(Won't you treat me) Won't you treat me like a little toy
(I'm just a comedy) I'm just a comedy you enjoy
I wanna be, I wanna be your pride and joy

I was sittin' there waitin' in a subway station
You're all in love investigation
It was a look and first reaction

I said you give, you give, you give me
You give, you give, you give me
Everything I need
Keep on, keep on, just give me
Keep on, keep on, just give me
Everything a love gonna need

(I wanna) I wanna be your pride and joy
(Won't you treat me) Won't you treat me like a little toy
(I'm just a comedy) I'm just a comedy you enjoy
I wanna be your pride and joy

(I wanna) I wanna be your pride and joy
(Won't you treat me) Won't you treat me like a little toy
(I'm just a comedy) I'm just a comedy you enjoy
I wanna be ooh your pride and joy

You give, you give, you give me
You give, you give, you give me
Everything I need
Keep on, keep on, just give me
Keep on, keep on, just give me
Love that satisfaction garantees

(I wanna) I wanna be your pride and joy
(Won't you treat me) Won't you treat me like a little toy
(I'm just a comedy) I'm just a comedy you enjoy
I wanna be your pride and joy

(I wanna) I wanna be your pride and joy
(Won't you treat me) Like a little toy
(I'm just a comedy) That you enjoy
I wanna be ooh

(I wanna) I wanna be your pride and joy
(Won't you treat me) Like a little toy
(I'm just a comedy) That you enjoy
I wanna be, ooh ooh, your pride and joy

Pride and joy
Your pride and joy
Pride and joy
